Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Interface Capable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Bug, Capabilities, Corpse, CraftableWeapon, Crater, Dirt, Fence, Floor, Floor, Ground, Human, Item, LockedDoor, MartianItem, Plank, Player, Player, Player, PortableItem, Stick, Tree, Tree, Wall, Weapon, WeaponItem, Zombie, ZombieActor
    public interface Capable
    An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
